title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: After modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately. Instead, the label height remains the same as before the font modification.
OB: The label height is not updated to reflect the change in font size. It remains the same as it was before the font modification.
EB: The label height should adjust automatically to accommodate the new font size. When the font size is modified, the label height should increase or decrease accordingly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label to the UI.
2. Edit the font size of the label and set it to "18 points". 
3. Observe that the label height does not change to reflect the modified font size.
